metadata.title: CVE-2021-47013 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net:emac/emac-mac: Fix a use after free in emac_mac_tx_buf_sendIn emac_mac_tx_buf_send, it calls emac_tx_fill_tpd(..,skb,..).If some error happens in emac_tx_fill_tpd(), the skb will be freed viadev_kfree_skb(skb) in error branch of emac_tx_fill_tpd().But the freed skb is still used via skb->len bynetdev_sent_queue(,skb->len).As i observed that emac_tx_fill_tpd() haven't modified the value ofskb->len,thus my patch assigns skb->len to 'len' before the possible free anduse 'len' instead of skb->len later.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
